results.name: Decimal expansion of (387 + 182*sqrt(2))/17^2.
comment: Lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) = (387 + 182*sqrt(2))/17^2 for n mod 3 = 1, b = A155923.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. A118120, A155923, A002193 (decimal expansion of sqrt(2)), A156035 (decimal expansion of 3+2*sqrt(2)), A156163 (decimal expansion of (19+6*sqrt(2))/17).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Mar 11 2009
